title: Interview with 2019 Temple Designer Geordie Van Der Bosch
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
I got a chance to ask this year’s Temple Designer about his inspirations, collaborators, favorite Principle, and even learned about a secret “easter egg” in this year’s Temple of Direction.

Hearing impaired or just annoyed by the sound of my voice? Check out the FULL TRANSCRIPT HERE.
